channel.title: InnovationX Source (BattleScape)
channel.description:
The donator system is a bit unknown for me? (Donator) (Donator) I do I make my self a Extreme or Premium member, I have looked in my character save and there is no 'is donator = 1'; InnovationX is a BattleScape source, so how would I get my character to be a donator?
(Sorry if this makes no sense; ^^) [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/3967/8e6d8015477e4b85a849f9b.png[/img]

item.title: InnovationX Source (BattleScape)
item.dc:creator: @AerialX AerialX
item.description:
@AerialX wrote:

baddy351:

Do you know if the source even has a donator system? if not then you will need to add one.

It does; There are items that require donator, and I fly a carpet to ‘donator island’ for a book that can summon pets, and it says I need donator to read it

Read full topic
